description.fr:
{%FightStarted} Invoque un {Summoning:4}.
\---
{%attack} Si la cible est en {#TENAILLE}, téléporte le {Summoning:4} à coté de la cible et déclenche son {%AT} sur la cible, puis le téléporte de {cell:d}.
\---
<rem>Limité à {value:limit} fois par tour.</rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} au {Summoning:4}.
description.en:
{%FightStarted} Summons one {Summoning:4}.
\---
{%attack} If the target is in {#TENAILLE}, teleports the {Summoning:4} next to the target and triggers its {%AT} on the target then teleports it {cell:d}.
\---
<rem>Limit: {value:limit} {limit, plural, one[time] other[times]} per turn.</rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} to the {Summoning:4}.
description.es:
{%FightStarted} Invoca un {Summoning:4}.
\---
{%attack} Si el objetivo está {#TENAILLE}, teletransporta al {Summoning:4} al lado del objetivo y activa su {%AT} en el objetivo, luego se teletransporta {cell:d}.
\---
<rem>Limitado a {value:limit} {limit, plural, one[vez] other[veces]} por turno.</rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} al {Summoning:4}.
description.de:
{%FightStarted} Beschwört einen {Summoning:4}.
\---
{%attack} Wenn das Ziel in der {#TENAILLE} ist, teleportiert sich der {Summoning:4} neben das Ziel und löst seinen {%AT} beim Ziel aus. Teleportiert sich dann um {cell:d}.
\---
<rem>Auf {value:limit}-mal pro Runde begrenzt.</rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} bei {Summoning:4}.
description.pt:
{%FightStarted} Invoca um {Summoning:4}.
\---
{%attack} Se o alvo estiver {#TENAILLE}, teletransporta o {Summoning:4} para o lado do alvo e aciona seu {%AT} sobre ele. Depois, se teletransporta por {cell:d}.
\---
</rem>Limite de {value:limit} {limit, plural, one[vez] other[vezes]} por turno.<rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} ao {Summoning:4}.
